vsParam:
This girl hasn't woken up yet.
I'm starting to get worried...

Yeah... I change her clothes and sheets every day.
Also, I use recovery magic on her whenever I'm available.

Sorry, I'm not powerful enough...
Boohoo... If only I studied harder...

It's not true!
Marjoram Sensei, you've tried your best!

Yeah, Sensei, you don't have to apologize.
It's just... I'm really worried about her.

Um... Um... That being the case, maybe we should
try something else except for magic.

Something else except for magic?
You mean...

No, relicology is not helpful for healing bodies.
Now it's time to use alchemy.

Yeah, right.
[px]... It's time to use your alchemy, hehe.

Bergamot... Bergamot Sensei taught me a recipe
to cure hangovers.

I only made potions,
so I failed anyway...

But as long as we modify it a bit...
Look, this is the specially made sobering recipe!

Wow, impressive...
You could design an alchemical recipe...

It must work very well.
Now, we just need [px] to synthesize the medicine...

Yeah.
Maybe we could wake this girl up.

It's just... We need a special ingredient,
which can only be gained after defeating monsters...

Don't worry. Let us deal with the monsters.
[px], let's go find the ingredient.

Ah, we could take Cresson with us this time?
He'll be a great help to defeat the monsters.

Then, go ahead... But be careful, OK?
Promise me. Don't get hurt...
